entities.name: GEFORCE
entities.description: GeForce GPUs are used for gaming and PCs, part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.

entities.name: NVIDIA RTX
entities.description: NVIDIA RTX GPUs are used for enterprise workstation graphics and gaming, part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.

entities.name: VIRTUAL GPU
entities.description: Virtual GPU or vGPU is software for cloud-based visual and virtual computing, part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.

entities.name: OMNIVERSE
entities.description: Omniverse is software for building 3D designs and virtual worlds, part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox provides networking and interconnect solutions, part of NVIDIA's Compute & Networking segment.

entities.name: NVIDIA AI ENTERPRISE
entities.description: NVIDIA AI Enterprise is software included in NVIDIA's Compute & Networking segment.

relationships.relationship_description: Both GeForce and NVIDIA RTX are part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment and serve gaming purposes.
Both NVIDIA RTX and Omniverse are part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.
Both GeForce and Omniverse are part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.
Both GeForce and Virtual GPU are part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.
Both NVIDIA RTX and Virtual GPU are part of NVIDIA's Graphics segment.
Both Mellanox and NVIDIA AI Enterprise are part of NVIDIA's Compute & Networking segment.
